1.0.name: wordpress/wp-easy-leads
1.0.description: WP Easy Leads is a lead generating plugin that lets you create your own lead page to capture lead. It allows you to upload video or images or simply add text to the page. It allows you to add Google Analytics ID and you can also add your custom html form code. It gives users multiple options to customize the page according to their needs. WP Easy Leads allows you to create multiple lead generating pages and display the one you like.
